mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_RIGHT(ID, NAME, TYPE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DEPT, REMARK) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{createBy}, #{createDept}, #{remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_RIGHT SET NAME=#{name}, TYPE=#{type}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy}, UPDATE_DEPT = #{updateDept}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime}, REMARK=#{remark} WHERE ID = #{id}
